content: i would like to uphold afri s point above, we are using pyrmont as a canary to stress test all pre production infra, yes, itâ€™s annoying that the resource consumption is through the roof, but it has enabled us to prevent quite a few things that might have otherwise only crept up in production...

author: potuz
content: But at no point I said to break it, it's a matter of testing it for a few hours how resources behave in case of non finality and then turning the validators back up... I frankly do not understand the reaction
